mapper.select: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, UPPER(DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING( COLUMN_TYPE, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')+1, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,')') - INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')-1 ), ',' ,1 ) AS LEN, IF( DATA_TYPE='decimal', SUBSTRING( SUBSTRING( COLUMN_TYPE, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')+1, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,')') - INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')-1 ), INSTR( SUBSTRING( COLUMN_TYPE, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')+1, INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,')') - INSTR(COLUMN_TYPE,'(')-1 ), ',' )+1 ),'') AS PREC, IF(COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI',ORDINAL_POSITION,'') AS 'PK', IF(IS_NULLABLE='YES' OR COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI','x','') AS 'MANDATORY' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schemaName} AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION
